short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go straight to a JIRA ticket using only the ID by typing J, hitting tab and then entering your ticket ID

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Chrome extension to take you directly to a task in JIRA by ID. 

In the browser address bar, just type J, then hit tab, and then enter your JIRA item ID and then hit return to be taken directly to your task. No digging through JIRA required!
